explains: n. 外科手术；<英>诊所；（议员的）接待时间；应诊时间；手术室
wordGroup: plastic surgery [医]整形外科

sentences.en: She's had laser surgery on her eye.
He had survived heart bypass surgery.
sentences.cn: 他在心脏搭桥手术中活了下来。

sentences.en: Surgery to a balky ankle was required.
sentences.cn: 脚踝受伤了，必须接受手术。
